data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ziyang. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ziyang, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ziyang, Sichuan, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 34 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Ziyang, Sichuan, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please give the people in the county of Ziyang access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Ziyang, Sichuan, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Naru people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Naru people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Naru people is yours.
Jesus, 270,800 people live in the county of Ziyang. Please, give them 54 new simple churches this year.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Ziyang, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Ziyang, Sichuan, China into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

location.name: Ziyang
location.people_groups_list: Naza, Nosu, Mangbu, Naju, Nosu, Butuo, Naxi, Northern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Naza (1,800), Nosu, Mangbu (87,000), Naju (1,900), Nosu, Butuo (277,000), Naxi, Northern (3,400)
